verses.roman:
bhaṅgi kari' svarūpa sabāra śrama jānāila
bhakta-gaṇera śrama dekhi' prabhura bāhya haila

synonyms: bhaṅgi kari'-showing an indication; svarūpa—Svarūpa Dāmodara; sabāra—of everyone; śrama—the fatigue; jānāila—made known; bhakta-gaṇera—of the devotees; śrama—the fatigue; dekhi'-seeing; prabhura—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bāhya haila—become externally conscious.
translation: Svarūpa Dāmodara then informed the Lord that all the devotees were fatigued. Seeing this situation, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu came to His external senses.
